post.body: have you listened to Band of Horses - same musical street but they've paid a visit to Crazy Horse!
ALL toes
I love how the Jools Holland hootashitty is the perfect distallation of British celebrity: kinda good but mostly a bit crap.
did the running it off grow yr beard back then?
always buy music from labels of trust. Fuck the majors and the homogenisation of music
That's 4chan - fingers still freezing
Got the lulz: 34cham hacking macrumorslive.com feed
Mac keynote underway: www.macrumorslve.com
Enjoying the Fleet Foxes album very much indeed
Not so cold in the studio but mind numblingly freezing on the bike
Can't feel toes
Full text of Steve Jobs's health issues: http://tinyurl.com/8ekoc2
It is slightly warmer in the studio - I personally turned up the heating to max - which of course means tepid.
I love my bed and it loves me
Yay! Xmas relatives run finally over & on way back to normality...
The party continues apace with sitting in front of the fire reading my book. The debauchery never stops.
Happy new year to everyone! I am now in my 30th year. Brilliant.
Starting on the trip to Drunktown. First stop champagne.
Suprisingly there is a Raymond Blanc restaurant in Leeds. Unsuprisingly it's good.
The Mrs and me are going on a chocolate making course courtesy of The McNichol's Senior. Yum!
